rows.label: qst711701_msg0001
rows.name:
Oh, friends! Are friends
maybe intrepid team of
fearless Blades and Drivers?

rows.label: qst711701_msg0002
rows.name:
Gororo is also Driver! ...Mo? What
you mean, "cool story"?! Is truth!
Gororo veteran of many-many battle!

rows.label: qst711701_msg0003
rows.name:
Now about to start new job, but it
sound like super-duper-mega faff,
so Gororo on lookout for allies!

rows.label: qst711701_msg0004
rows.name:
Hrm-mo-mo... Friends look
competent, but Gororo know
better than to trust appearance.

rows.label: qst711701_msg0005
rows.name:
Will give friends test! As for
specifics of test, hrmm...

rows.label: qst711701_msg0006
rows.name:
YES! Gororo just have most
excellent brainwave!

rows.label: qst711701_msg0007
rows.name:
Want to see friends topple five
enemies using Driver Combo technique!
Any foe will do, Gororo not picky.

rows.label: qst711701_msg0008
rows.name:
Friends know how Topple
work, yes? First use Driver
Art to inflict Break...

rows.label: qst711701_msg0009
rows.name:
Then tell Blade to do attack
and watch enemy hit deck
like sack of mushrooms!

rows.label: qst711701_msg0010
rows.name:
Is simple, no? Do Break,
then do Topple... Repeat
five times and pass test!

rows.label: qst711701_msg0011
rows.name:
And then when ready, not forget to
come see Gororo and give good news!
